tool_description: The Horse Racing API provides access to a comprehensive database of horse racing data, including historical race results, horse profiles, and event schedules. Whether you're an avid horse racing enthusiast or a developer looking to integrate horse racing data into your applications, our API offers a wealth of information to enhance your experience and analysis in the world of horse racing.
name: Horse Racing API
title: Horse Racing API

api_list.name: Health Check
api_list.description: verify if the API is running
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-api1.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Prognoses
api_list.description: Get the prognoses of zeturf.com for a given race
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
